item.title: ‘NCIS’ Star Cote de Pablo Rejected Intimacy Coordinator for ‘Tony & Ziva’ Because ‘We Don’t Want to Be Micromanaged’; Michael Weatherly Left Choice Up to Her
item.description: “NCIS” favorite Cote de Pablo recently told TV Insider that she turned down the offer to use an intimacy coordinator with co-star Michael Weatherly on their upcoming franchise sequel serie
